LaserHomingKeepTime.description: How long the lasers should continue to home-in on the player.

LaserRotateAngleMax.description: The maximum angle the lasers can rotate to.

LaserNonHomingLength.description: The length of the lasers when not homing-in on the player.

LaserRange.description: How far the lasers can be shot.

FireInterval.description: How often lasers should be fired.

AttackAfterWaitTime.description: After wait time, how long to fire.

Extra.value: A turret from Egg Gate which fires at the player.
